projects.title: Connect 4
projects.bodyText:
- A fully functional Connect 4 game, incorporating core logic in adherence to game rules.
 - Robust AI opponent using Minimax algorithm with stochastic elements and alpha-beta pruning.
 - Employed modular coding practices and object-oriented design, facilitating easy updates, maintenance, and potential feature expansions.
